dt: {bc}a sequence of characters that identifies a user (such as on a computer system, website, or social media platform)

dt.t: Never reuse a {wi}username{/wi} and password combination. While doing so is convenient, if that combination is ever stolen from one service you use … it will expose every service you have that uses it.
These e-mail addresses generally look like this: "{wi}username{/wi}@location.xxx".

shortdef: a sequence of characters that identifies a user (such as on a computer system, website, or social media platform) —called also user ID
